content: single_crochet 1sc in next 2 single_crochet 36st round 7 *2sc in next single_crochet 1sc in next 5 single_crochet* repeat ** all the way around 42st round 8 1sc in next 3 single_crochet then *2sc in next single_crochet 1sc in next 6 single_crochet* repeat ** 5 times 2sc in next single_crochet 1sc in next 3 single_crochet 48st round 9-10 1sc in each single_crochet around 48st round 11 *2sc in next single_crochet 1sc in next 7 single_crochet* repeat ** all the way around 54st round 12-13 1sc in each single_crochet around 54st catskitschen 2025 round 14 1sc in next 4 single_crochet then *2sc in next single_crochet 1sc in next 8 single_crochet* repeat ** 5 times 2sc in next single_crochet 1sc in next 4 single_crochet 60st round 15-16 1sc in each single_crochet around 60st round 17 *2sc in next single_crochet 1sc in next 9 single_crochet* repeat ** all the way around 66st round 18-22 5 rounds 1sc in each single_crochet around 66st round 23 *1sc in next 9 single_crochet decrease* repeat ** all the way around 60st round 24 *1sc in next 8 single_crochet decrease* repeat ** all the way around 54st round 25 *2sc in next single_crochet 1sc in next 8 single_crochet* repeat ** all the way around 60st round 26 1sc in each single_crochet around 60st round 27 *2sc in next single_crochet 1sc in next 9 single_crochet* repeat ** all the way around 66st round 28-32 5 rounds 1sc in each single_crochet around 66st mark round 32 you will be picking up in this round for round 38 round 33 *2sc in next single_crochet * repeat ** all the way around 112st round 34-36 1sc in each single_crochet around 112st round 37 slip_stitch in next single_crochet sk1 *5dc in next single_crochet skip 1 slip_stitch in next single_crochet skip 1* repeat ** all the way around and slip_stitch into starting slip_stitch bind o cid 431 and weave in tail place eyes between rounds 17 and 18 8 stitches apart attach the ears to the body between rounds 5 and 13 attach the arms to the body between rounds 25 and 30 attach the bow to the body whether it be top of head front of ear front of body etc round 38 join colour a to the wrong side/inside of round 32 via a back post this round is worked in back post single_crochet all the way around make sure you are crocheting so that the right side of the stitch ends up on the right side of the ghost see pictures below *bpsc in next 9 single_crochet bpsc2tog* repeat ** all the way around 60st - correct orientation catskitschen 2025 change to colour b round 39 this row is worked normally-*1sc in next 8 single_crochet decrease* repeat ** all the way around 54st round 40 *1sc in next 7 single_crochet decrease* repeat ** all the way around 48st place legs facing towards the front of the body 2 stitches apart in round 41 you will be working
